greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of k-element subsets of [n] having a square element sum; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..200, flattened
formula: T(n,n) = 1 for n in { A001108 }, T(n,n) = 0 otherwise.
maple: b:= proc(n, s) option remember; expand(`if`(n=0,
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..n))(b(n, 0)):
mathematica: b[n_, s_] := b[n, s] = Expand[If[n == 0, If[IntegerQ @ Sqrt[s], 1, 0], b[n - 1, s] + x*b[n - 1, s + n]]];
T[n_] := Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, n}]][b[n, 0]];
Table[T[n], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 03 2018, from Maple *)
xref: Main diagonal is characteristic function of A001108.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jan 31 2017
